author: sky.cactus
content: Just close the PRs for the ones you don't want to be stagnant, and approve the ones you do.  Would be good to take action on the non-stagnant ones as well.

author: alita85
content: I can also add functionality for not making PRs for closed ones as well

author: alita85
content: Or maybe it can recreate the PR in 6 months?

author: alita85
content: Because right now if you close it it'll create a new one in a week
